articles.author: Christina Carrega
articles.title: Missing 3-year-old's father wanted for murder in death of boy's mother
articles.description: Roswell Police Department issued an arrest warrant on Thursday for Jorge Rico-Ruvira and charged him with first-degree murder.
articles.content:
Police in New Mexico are on the hunt for a 32-year-old man, who went missing with his 3-year-old son, after allegedly killing the mother of his child.
An arrest warrant was issued late Wednesday night for Jorge Rico-Ruvira for first-degree murder in the deat… [+1007 chars]

articles.title: Find Your #HappyPlace: Find the Basketball Superstar in You at NBA Experience
